column1: Little Goat Diner////I personally ordered the okonomiyaki
column2: a Japanese savory pancake with pork belly
column3: topped with an egg and drizzled with sauces similar to what you'd find on takoyaki. Pancake itself was so soft and burst with flavors. I also tried my mom's dish
column4: This Little Piggy Went to China. It reminded me of an Asian inspired eggs benedict. It's a bit on the salty side
column5: but I love salty so fine by me.
